title: Invert Dictionary with Duplicates
description: In this lab, you will learn how to invert a dictionary with non-unique hashable values in Python using the `collections.defaultdict` and list comprehension.

meta.title: Python Dictionary Inversion | Data Structures
meta.description: Learn how to invert a dictionary with non-unique hashable values in Python. Discover a step-by-step approach to this fundamental data structure challenge.
meta.keywords: Python, dictionary, data structures, invert, non-unique values
